	<h2>Fighters with a Forever Bond</h2>

	<div class="column four callouts">
		

<div class="module callout">
	
	<h2 id="contentmaster_1_pagemaincontent_2_columncalloutlast_0_callout_header">
		Get in the Game!
	</h2>
	<div class="module-body">
		<div id="contentmaster_1_pagemaincontent_2_columncalloutlast_0_pnlImageNoWrap" class="callout_image image_body ">
	
			<img src="/-/media/cincinnati childrens/home/default/giving column/home-giving-3-16-18-brackets-230x.jpg?h=216&amp;w=230&amp;la=en&hash=7FCE93CDCB05BBE6139AF238E2A886596B96E2A8" class="img-responsive shadow img-responsive" alt="A young boy smiling." />
		
</div>
		<p>Cincinnati Children&rsquo;s is participating in the 2018 Brackets for Good Cincinnati tournament! With your support, we could win $10,000!</p>
<p>We are matched up against charities from across the Greater Cincinnati area in this March Madness-style competition. $1 = 1 point. The team with the most money donated at the end of each round moves on to compete against a new nonprofit team.&nbsp;</p>
<p>The money raised this week will support the incredible work our Child Life team does for our NICU families. Kids like Calvin are thriving today because of the expert care they&rsquo;ve received from so many of our caregivers throughout the medical center.</p>
<p><a href="https://cincinnati.bfg.org/cart/checkout/cincinnati-childrens-hospital-medical-center" target="_blank" title="Join the Cincinnati Children‚Äôs team today.">Join the Cincinnati Children&rsquo;s team today</a>. Make a gift before 8 pm on Friday, Mar 23, and help us make it to the next round!</p>
		
	</div>
</div>


<div class="module callout">
	
	
	<div class="module-body">
		<div id="contentmaster_1_pagemaincontent_2_columncalloutlast_1_pnlImageNoWrap" class="callout_image image_body ">
	
			
		
</div>
		<a href="/about/us-news-rankings"><img width="235" height="200" alt="View our U.S. News & World Report rankings." src="/-/media/cincinnati childrens/home/default/us-news-promo-235x200-slice.jpg?la=en&hash=BA6DEDA397F92E55F0A6FF79DFC788D720AC5C1A" /></a>
		
	</div>
